divs: Sighting DetailsI was checking out the Mt Wilson observatory webcam as I usually do every evening and the camera was facing toward burbank at the time. I saw the strange V shaped vehicle flying over what it looked like to be burbank. I copied it and kept it on my computer. I enlarged it via the adobe photoshop soft ware and it did not look anything like an airplane to me.
Summary: Image of a V shape object over Burbank CA
